text: Lukáš Marek (born 30 January 1981) is a retired Czech football player who played in the Czech First League for Bohemians 1905. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Czech footballers Category:Czech Republic youth international footballers Category:Czech Republic under-21 international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Czech First League players Category:Bohemians 1905 players
title: Lukáš Marek
